summary: WHILE DRIVING VEHICLE WILL STALL WITHOUT WARNING.  THE VEHICLE SERVICED SEVERAL TIMES FOR THIS PROBLEM, BUT THE DEALERSHIP CAN NOT DUPLICATE, SO THEY CANNOT FIX THE PROBLEM. UPON FURTHER  INSPECTION OF THE VEHICLE BY THE CONSUMER, THEY NOTICED THAT IGNITION CAN BE SWITCHED TOWARD THE ACCESSORY MODE WITHOUT MUCH FORCE. CONSUMER INFORMED DEALERSHIP AND DAIMLER CHRYSLER.
